News.headline: Free UK Postage on Daggers Online Shop & Home Shirts Reduced
News.page_title: Free UK Postage on Daggers Online Shop & Home Shirts Reduced
News.URL_keywords: Free UK Postage on Daggers Online Shop & Home Shirts Reduced
News.short_description: Fans will be able to receive Free UK Delivery on all products on the Daggers Online Shop until Friday 10th February at 12:00pm.
News.description:
As well as the offer of Free UK postage, the Daggers have reduced Home Replica Shirts, where fans can save up to 40%.

Don't forget to take advantage of the free postage to get any Daggers products on the Online Shop including the Dagenham & Redbridge home shirt which has been reduced to £25.00 from £43.00 for an Adult shirt and to £20.00 from £31.00 for a Junior shirt.

This special offer of free postage will be available to all supporters when they purchase products on the website and will only be available until the 10th February so make sure you don't miss your opportunity!

Please note that any orders made this Friday may not be posted out until Monday 13th February.

Full details on Replica Home Shirts:
Adult Home Shirt - £25.00
Junior Home Shirt - £20.00
Baby Home Shirts - £20.00
Adult Home Kit – £38.80
Junior Home Kit – £32.00
Baby Home Kit - £30.00

See below for purchase details and club shop opening times.

Purchase:
www.daggers-shop.co.uk/

Club Opening Times:
www.daggers.co.uk/tickets/openinghours/
